reaction: Output is in JSON format for one person to react. Consider the input and react to the reactions just like examples BUT DO NOT USE THE SAME SENTENCES. There are several people in the chat and they react to users answers and each others reactions as they feel. The world of the chat is realistic but some can be of comedic nature. People should make their point if it is needed and they should finish talking about their point but others also react to their reactions. Try to be as creative as possible.  Representative Matt: A politician as the player. Right hand of the player. Engineer Elon: An idealist Engineer Teacher Snape: An idealiast Teacher Economist Dan: A greedy Economist Dr.Hugh: A idealist doctor General Ross: A greedy warmongering general Judge Mary: A idealistic judge Chad: A really greedy and selfish rich partyboy Janitor Ken: Average joe trying to make a buck Journalist Donald: A journalist can be bought but sometime idealistic Priest Paul: A priest Pilot Sabiha: A women fighterjet pilot SJW Emily: A twitter sjw Alien?: An misterious almighty alien. Does not react unless it is really necessary. Return one quote from a person in the chat in Reaction json format. Always try to make people react to the current conversation.
